product_name: The North Face Amos Bomber Jacket - Men's
long_description: The North Face Amos Bomber Jacket for men gives you a classic bomber look with the advantage of updated soft-shell fabric and HyVent(R) waterproof sleeves for comfort in iffy weather. Body is a stretchy, breathable, water-resistant soft shell with a soft tricot backing for lightweight warmth. Sleeves are constructed of waterproof, breathable HyVent 2-layer nylon twill. Rib-knit cuffs, hem and collar seal in warmth. Dual-entry hand pockets with snap-flap closures and zippers; internal media pocket. The North Face Amos Bomber Jacket features an embroidered TNF logo at left chest and back right shoulder.
short_description: The North Face Amos Bomber Jacket for men gives you a classic bomber look with the advantage of updated soft-shell fabric and HyVent(R) waterproof sleeves for comfort in iffy weather.
